name: Eclipse of the Heart
description:
When naivety and adolescence are the frames from which you intake the world, when everything is new, is also when you are as a human your most vulnerable. Jack takes on the frightening stages of gaining conscientiousness as a boy, and losing his father.

Game created on GB studio, art created on aesprite!

Will develop the game more and more over the summer :) 

Inspiriation drawn from reddit.com/r/gbstudio

and GB studio Creator Chris Malby
